item.title: Getting Started With Fastai
item.description: I will be documenting content that I’ve extracted from Jermemy Howards’s lectures. This was suggested to be a very good introduction to machine learning that’s very different from the approach that other courses take. In these courses, Jeremy uses a top down approach, which I really like. This will help us tackle Kaggle challenges that will surely make us better data scientists, right? So lets get started!
